obsidian_black.description: Base layer. Pure void. Represents foundational depth.

ash_graphite.description: Primary dark gray. For surfaces, containers, and soft contrast.

bone_white.description: Background. Aged ivory, evokes discipline without coldness.

slate_steel.description: Muted gray-blue. Invokes intellect, subtle cold fire.

crimson_signal.description: Sharp call to action. Warning and clarity. Use sparingly.

iron_ochre.description: Earth-scorched rust. For highlighting constructiveness and grounded will.

deep_indigo.description: Mystical intelligence. Use to signal agentic systems or AI elements.

signal_gold.description: Rare. Precision emphasis. Use to mark rare truths or strategic leverage points.

fog_grey.description: Light neutral. Use for disabled states, metadata, or background grids.

charcoal_tint.description: Slightly raised black. Useful for shadows, layering, or inset contrast.
